Question: Bolt Graphics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Bolt Graphics

Product: Thunder Graphics Processor

- Twice the speed of the most powerful GPU while consuming only half the power
- Enhanced rendering performance for higher-quality content with reduced time and effort
- Expandable memory support and shared remote memory allocation
- Direct attach storage and additional accelerators
- Built-in support for key standards and formats
- Integration into key software packages including Unreal Engine, Unity, Godot, Autodesk suite, and Blender
- Smaller sibling optimized for mobile devices, Lightning, with further advancements
- Available for interviews and demonstrations during CES week
